Class EventBus

java.lang.Object
com.reversi.common.EventBus
public class EventBus extends Object
A simple generic event bus for registering and dispatching events.

  • Constructor Summary

    Description

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    <T extends Event>
    EventBus
    post(T event)
    Posts an event to all registered listeners that handle this event type.
    <T extends Event>
    EventBus
    register(Class<T> eventType, EventListener<T> listener)
    Registers a listener for a specific type of event.

    • EventBus

      public EventBus()

  • Method Details

    • register

      public <T extends Event> EventBus register(Class<T> eventType, EventListener<T> listener)
      Registers a listener for a specific type of event.
      Type Parameters:
      T - the type of the event
      Parameters:
      eventType - the class type of the event to listen for
      listener - the listener implementation

    • post

      public <T extends Event> EventBus post(T event)
      Posts an event to all registered listeners that handle this event type. Expired listeners are removed during traversal.
      Type Parameters:
      T - the type of the event
      Parameters:
      event - the event to dispatch
